comments.html:
Excellent sheet. I believe I have an older copy or something very similar from 2012. But this is great as well as the PacketLife sheets to add to the collection. Here is a link on a nice addressing tool I used a few projects back in the spirit of sharing.

http://doc.tavian.com/cgi-bin/calculate.pl


Thanks again.
comments.name: jsicuran

comments.html:
Daniel, about that time I was working to get a redirect to a new version working when you tried....the original link does work again, but the pdf is now version 1.4.

Thanx...Jeff
comments.name: Jeff Carrell

comments.html: Fixed the URL - Jeff sent me a version-independent one, so it should work "forever"
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Right now, the working URL is : http://teachmeipv6.com/IPv6-Essentials-Cheat-Sheet-v1.4.pdf   (not v1.3 anymore)
comments.name: Daniel

comments.html:
Thanx Ivan for the post! Thanx to all who have d/l the cheat sheet. I hope you find it useful in your IPv6 travels :-)

It was pointed out to me that I had a couple typos in the doc, so I have updated it to v1.4.

If you access the file from the link in Ivan's original post, you will now get the new doc.

Here is a new URL that will be constant no matter the version: http://www.teachmeipv6.com/IPv6-Essentials-Cheat-Sheet.pdf

Thanx again one and all...Jeff
comments.name: Jeff Carrell
